events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer role on May 1st, and our team will begin reviewing your qualifications shortly.
Your application has been categorized under our engineering department focusing on software development positions.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your profile and will be in touch soon for next steps.
The initial screening call was conducted successfully, discussing your background and software engineering experience.
The candidate responded promptly and enthusiastically about proceeding to the technical interview stage.
We have scheduled your technical interview for May 10th to further assess your software engineering skills.
Your technical interview was completed successfully with positive feedback regarding your coding and problem-solving abilities.
An HR interview has been scheduled for May 15th to discuss your overall fit and company culture alignment.
Your HR interview went well, with positive discussions about your motivations and career goals.
We have proposed an official offer for the software engineer position, including salary and benefits details.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed excitement about the opportunity.
You have accepted our offer to join the engineering team, and we look forward to working together.
Your onboarding process has started, including orientation and setup for your software engineering role.
The hiring process is now closed successfully with you joining our engineering team officially.
